string.name: photopicker_select_button_label
string.translation_description: Button label to select the previewed photo.

string.name: photopicker_deselect_button_label
string.translation_description: Button label to deselect the previewed photo.

string.name: photopicker_preview_button_label
string.translation_description: Button label to navigate to a screen and preview the selected media.

string.name: photopicker_preview_dialog_error_title
string.translation_description: Dialog title for when a video cannot be played.

string.name: photopicker_preview_dialog_error_message
string.translation_description: Dialog message for when a video cannot be played due to an internet connection issue.

resources.string: Check your internet connection and try again

string.name: photopicker_preview_dialog_error_retry_button_label
string.translation_description: Button label to allow a user to attempt to play a video again after an error.

string.name: photopicker_preview_video_error_snackbar
string.translation_description: Snackbar message shown to the user when the requested video cannot be played.

string.name: photopicker_video_play_button_description
string.translation_description: Accessibility description for a video player Play button

string.name: photopicker_video_pause_button_description
string.translation_description: Accessibility description for a video player Pause button

string.name: photopicker_video_mute_button_description
string.translation_description: Accessibility description for a video player volume Mute button

string.name: photopicker_video_unmute_button_description
string.translation_description: Accessibility description for a video player volume Unmute button
